messages.subject: Re: Unschooling or not?
messages.msgSnippet: ... books he ... there with ... Yeah, he hangs out over there quite a bit.  And she is really good at reading his moods and figuring out what he is in the mood
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "zenmomma *" <zenmomma@h...> wrote:
> >>my mom does not do some pre-set structured curriculum. They read
books he
> >>chooses and do science things he's interested in, etc.>>
>
> Sounds fun. Does he ever want to just hang out or just "be" over
there with
> Gram? Just curious. :o)

Yeah, he hangs out over there quite a bit. And she is really good at
reading his moods and figuring out what he is in the mood to do.
The only thing he is even mildly coerced into over there is exercise
and that's more of a cajoling kind of 'come on let's go do this
thing'.

Bridget

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling or not?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sounds fun. Does he ever want to just hang out or just be over there with Gram? Just curious. :o) ... Yea! Hope your health continues to improve. :o)
messages.messageBody:
>>my mom does not do some pre-set structured curriculum. They read books he
>>chooses and do science things he's interested in, etc.>>

Sounds fun. Does he ever want to just hang out or just "be" over there with
Gram? Just curious. :o)

>>I've only just been release by my doc for (all but one) normal activity
>>this week.>>

Yea! Hope your health continues to improve. :o)

Life is good.
~Mary
